sentences.sContent: She welcomed her unexpected visitor with irreproachable politeness.
sentences.sCn: 她以无可指摘的礼仪接待了不速之客。

synos.tran: 无可指责的；[法]无过失的

trans.tranCn: 无可指责的, 不可非难的, 无缺点的, 无过失的
trans.tranOther: something, such as someone’s behaviour, that is irreproachable is so good that you cannot criticize it
